attributes.action:
Don't Die of Ignorance!
Produce a Public Information Film about Covid 19!
attributes.additional_details:
The time has come to take a tougher line with people who still don't believe or want to believe the dangers of Covid19.
The 1987 Aids Public Information Film was effective and powerful.
We need a modern day equivalent to address the dangers of Covid19.

Don't Die of Ignorance!
attributes.background:
In 1987, the Government of the day produced a hard hitting Public Information Film warning about the dangers of AIDS.
As we grapple with Covid19, the time has come for the Government to produce a hard hitting Public Information Film to get their message across.

rejection.details:
The Government has been regularly advertising public information about Covid-19 since the the start of the pandemic. We're not sure what changes you would like to see.

Since you started this petition the Government have launched a new campaign. You can find information about the most recent campaign here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-tv-advert-urges-public-to-stay-at-home-to-protect-the-nhs-and-save-lives
